00059 static inline BL::Mesh object_to_mesh(BL::Object self, BL::Scene scene, bool apply_modifiers, bool render)
00060 {
00061     ID *data = rna_Object_to_mesh(self.ptr.data, NULL, scene.ptr.data, apply_modifiers, (render)? 2: 1);
00062     PointerRNA ptr;
00063     RNA_id_pointer_create(data, &ptr);
00064     return BL::Mesh(ptr);
00065 }
00066 
00067 static inline void colorramp_to_array(BL::ColorRamp ramp, float4 *data, int size)
00068 {
00069     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00070         float color[4];
00071 
00072         rna_ColorRamp_eval(ramp.ptr.data, i/(float)(size-1), color);
00073         data[i] = make_float4(color[0], color[1], color[2], color[3]);
00074     }
00075 }
00076 
00077 static inline void object_remove_mesh(BL::BlendData data, BL::Mesh mesh)
00078 {
00079     rna_Main_meshes_remove(data.ptr.data, NULL, mesh.ptr.data);
00080 }
00081 
00082 static inline void object_create_duplilist(BL::Object self, BL::Scene scene)
00083 {
00084     rna_Object_create_duplilist(self.ptr.data, NULL, scene.ptr.data);
00085 }
00086 
00087 static inline void object_free_duplilist(BL::Object self)
00088 {
00089     rna_Object_free_duplilist(self.ptr.data, NULL);
00090 }
00091 
00092 static inline bool object_is_modified(BL::Object self, BL::Scene scene, bool preview)
00093 {
00094     return rna_Object_is_modified(self.ptr.data, scene.ptr.data, (preview)? (1<<0): (1<<1))? true: false;
00095 }

00099 static inline Transform get_transform(BL::Array<float, 16> array)
00100 {
00101     Transform tfm;
00102 
00103     /* we assume both types to be just 16 floats, and transpose because blender
00104        use column major matrix order while we use row major */
00105     memcpy(&tfm, &array, sizeof(float)*16);
00106     tfm = transform_transpose(tfm);
00107 
00108     return tfm;
00109 }
00110 
00111 static inline float2 get_float2(BL::Array<float, 2> array)
00112 {
00113     return make_float2(array[0], array[1]);
00114 }
00115 
00116 static inline float3 get_float3(BL::Array<float, 2> array)
00117 {
00118     return make_float3(array[0], array[1], 0.0f);
00119 }
00120 
00121 static inline float3 get_float3(BL::Array<float, 3> array)
00122 {
00123     return make_float3(array[0], array[1], array[2]);
00124 }
00125 
00126 static inline float3 get_float3(BL::Array<float, 4> array)
00127 {
00128     return make_float3(array[0], array[1], array[2]);
00129 }
00130 
00131 static inline int4 get_int4(BL::Array<int, 4> array)
00132 {
00133     return make_int4(array[0], array[1], array[2], array[3]);
00134 }
00135 
00136 static inline uint get_layer(BL::Array<int, 20> array)
00137 {
00138     uint layer = 0;
00139 
00140     for(uint i = 0; i < 20; i++)
00141         if(array[i])
00142             layer |= (1 << i);
00143     
00144     return layer;
00145 }

00155 {
00156     return RNA_boolean_get(&ptr, name)? true: false;

00174 static inline string get_enum_identifier(PointerRNA& ptr, const char *name)
00175 {
00176     PropertyRNA *prop = RNA_struct_find_property(&ptr, name);
00177     const char *identifier = "";
00178     int value = RNA_property_enum_get(&ptr, prop);
00179 
00180     RNA_property_enum_identifier(NULL, &ptr, prop, value, &identifier);
00181 
00182     return string(identifier);
00183 }

00185 /* Relative Paths */
00186 
00187 static inline string blender_absolute_path(BL::BlendData b_data, BL::ID b_id, const string& path)
00188 {
00189     if(path.size() >= 2 && path[0] == '/' && path[1] == '/') {
00190         string dirname;
00191         
00192         if(b_id.library())
00193             dirname = blender_absolute_path(b_data, b_id.library(), b_id.library().filepath());
00194         else
00195             dirname = b_data.filepath();
00196 
00197         return path_join(path_dirname(dirname), path.substr(2));
00198     }
00199 
00200     return path;
00201 }
00202 
00203 /* ID Map
00204  *
00205  * Utility class to keep in sync with blender data.
00206  * Used for objects, meshes, lights and shaders. */
00207 
00208 template<typename K, typename T>
00209 class id_map {
00210 public:
00211     id_map(vector<T*> *scene_data_)
00212     {
00213         scene_data = scene_data_;
00214     }
00215 
00216     T *find(BL::ID id)
00217     {
00218         return find(id.ptr.id.data);
00219     }
00220 
00221     T *find(const K& key)
00222     {
00223         if(b_map.find(key) != b_map.end()) {
00224             T *data = b_map[key];
00225             return data;
00226         }
00227 
00228         return NULL;
00229     }
00230 
00231     void set_recalc(BL::ID id)
00232     {
00233         b_recalc.insert(id.ptr.data);
00234     }
00235 
00236     bool has_recalc()
00237     {
00238         return !(b_recalc.empty());
00239     }
00240 
00241     void pre_sync()
00242     {
00243         used_set.clear();
00244     }
00245 
00246     bool sync(T **r_data, BL::ID id)
00247     {
00248         return sync(r_data, id, id, id.ptr.id.data);
00249     }
00250 
00251     bool sync(T **r_data, BL::ID id, BL::ID parent, const K& key)
00252     {
00253         T *data = find(key);
00254         bool recalc;
00255 
00256         if(!data) {
00257             /* add data if it didn't exist yet */
00258             data = new T();
00259             scene_data->push_back(data);
00260             b_map[key] = data;
00261             recalc = true;
00262         }
00263         else {
00264             recalc = (b_recalc.find(id.ptr.data) != b_recalc.end());
00265             if(parent.ptr.data)
00266                 recalc = recalc || (b_recalc.find(parent.ptr.data) != b_recalc.end());
00267         }
00268 
00269         used(data);
00270 
00271         *r_data = data;
00272         return recalc;
00273     }
00274 
00275     void used(T *data)
00276     {
00277         /* tag data as still in use */
00278         used_set.insert(data);
00279     }
00280 
00281     void set_default(T *data)
00282     {
00283         b_map[NULL] = data;
00284     }
00285 
00286     bool post_sync(bool do_delete = true)
00287     {
00288         /* remove unused data */
00289         vector<T*> new_scene_data;
00290         typename vector<T*>::iterator it;
00291         bool deleted = false;
00292 
00293         for(it = scene_data->begin(); it != scene_data->end(); it++) {
00294             T *data = *it;
00295 
00296             if(do_delete && used_set.find(data) == used_set.end()) {
00297                 delete data;
00298                 deleted = true;
00299             }
00300             else
00301                 new_scene_data.push_back(data);
00302         }
00303 
00304         *scene_data = new_scene_data;
00305 
00306         /* update mapping */
00307         map<K, T*> new_map;
00308         typedef pair<const K, T*> TMapPair;
00309         typename map<K, T*>::iterator jt;
00310 
00311         for(jt = b_map.begin(); jt != b_map.end(); jt++) {
00312             TMapPair& pair = *jt;
00313 
00314             if(used_set.find(pair.second) != used_set.end())
00315                 new_map[pair.first] = pair.second;
00316         }
00317 
00318         used_set.clear();
00319         b_recalc.clear();
00320         b_map = new_map;
00321 
00322         return deleted;
00323     }
00324 
00325 protected:
00326     vector<T*> *scene_data;
00327     map<K, T*> b_map;
00328     set<T*> used_set;
00329     set<void*> b_recalc;
00330 };
00331 
00332 /* Object Key */
00333 
00334 struct ObjectKey {
00335     void *parent;
00336     int index;
00337     void *ob;
00338 
00339     ObjectKey(void *parent_, int index_, void *ob_)
00340     : parent(parent_), index(index_), ob(ob_) {}
00341 
00342     bool operator<(const ObjectKey& k) const
00343     { return (parent < k.parent || (parent == k.parent && (index < k.index || (index == k.index && ob < k.ob)))); }
00344 };
